title: Player1.1
body: Hands up, evildoer! [[Answer:Boss2.1|Boss2.1]]

title: Boss2.1
body: Oh well if it isn't the police. Well, without a valid warrant, I am totally safe! Mwuahahaha! [[Answer:Player3.1|Player3.1]]

title: Player3.1
body: show warrant [[Answer:Boss4.2|Boss4.2]]

title: Boss4.1
body: A thousand and one curses on you! [[Answer:Boss4.3|Boss4.3]]

title: Boss4.2
body: Hmm. Well, everything seems to be in order [[Answer:Boss4.1|Boss4.1]]

title: Boss4.3
body: How did you defeat my elite forces, anyways? [[Answer:Player5.1|Player5.1]] [[Answer:Player5.2|Player5.2]] [[Answer:Player5.3|Player5.3]]

title: Player5.1
body: Ha! You call those elite? A troop of cub scouts with water pistols could have defeated them! [[Answer:Boss6.1|Boss6.1]]

title: Player5.2
body: Well, it wasn't hard. After all, they are snails... [[Answer:Boss6.3|Boss6.3]]

title: Player5.3
body: They don't call me "the cop who can't be stopped" for nothing [[Answer:Boss6.5|Boss6.5]]

title: Boss6.1
body: Well there's no need to be rude about it [[Answer:Boss6.2|Boss6.2]]

title: Boss6.2
body: Can't we just have a civilized rivalry? [[Answer:Player7.1|Player7.1]] [[Answer:Player7.2|Player7.2]]

title: Boss6.3
body: Snails?! All of them?! [[Answer:Boss6.4|Boss6.4]]

title: Boss6.4
body: Even lil Jerry? The guy at the front? Wears glasses and a hat? [[Answer:Player7.3|Player7.3]] [[Answer:Player7.4|Player7.4]]

title: Player7.1
body: You're right, I'm sorry [[Answer:Boss8.1|Boss8.1]]

title: Player7.2
body: The only thing that will be civilized is when I wear a suit to your funeral! [[Answer:Boss8.3|Boss8.3]]

title: Player7.3
body: You know, now that you mention it, he seemed totally human. Yep, nothing snail like about him [[Answer:Boss8.4|Boss8.4]]

title: Player7.4
body: Yep, even him. The mustache is fake [[Answer:Boss8.5|Boss8.5]]

title: Boss6.5
body: Well prepare to be stopped, cop! [[Answer:Player7.5|Player7.5]] [[Answer:Player9.2|Player9.2]]

title: Boss8.1
body: Thank you! Too often do forget the pleasantries while committing crimes [[Answer:Boss8.2|Boss8.2]]

title: Boss8.2
body: Now, shall we fight? [[Answer:Player9.1|Player9.1]] [[Answer:Player9.2|Player9.2]]

title: Player9.1
body: I would like nothing more

title: Player9.2
body: Actually, can we start this whole conversation over again? [[Answer:Player1.1|Player1.1]]

title: Boss8.3
body: Ha! I think not! Shall we fight then, so I can crush you? [[Answer:Player9.2|Player9.2]] [[Answer:Player9.3|Player9.3]]

title: Player9.3
body: Prepare to become escargot!

title: Boss8.4
body: Well that's some small comfort. Now I can destroy you! [[Answer:Player9.2|Player9.2]] [[Answer:Player9.4|Player9.4]]

title: Player9.4
body: Not if I destroy you first!

title: Boss8.5
body: I feel so betrayed. He played saxophone at my sister's wedding! [[Answer:Player9.5|Player9.5]] [[Answer:Player9.6|Player9.6]]

title: Player9.5
body: This feels like a bad time. I'm just gonna go... %%%credits%%%

title: Player9.6
body: Would a fight to the death make you feel better? [[Answer:Boss10.1|Boss10.1]]

title: Boss10.1
body: You know, it really would. Let's do this! [[Answer:Player11.1|Player11.1]] [[Answer:Player9.2|Player9.2]]

title: Player11.1
body: Let's go, buddy

title: Player7.5
body: AHHHHHH!!! [i]attacks[/i]
